did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: First Presbyterian Church of Skaneateles records, 1801-1907.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: First Presbyterian Church of Skaneateles (Skaneateles, N.Y.)

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Several volumes containing meeting minutes, membership lists, and birth records. Also includes a register, deaths and funerals, church members, baptisms, marriages and non-resident members, and newspaper articles on the centennial history of the church.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: One volume contains meeting minutes, membership lists, and birth records, 1801-1843. One volume contains records for 1801-1918 including register (1853-1905), deaths and funerals, church members, baptisms, marriages and non-resident members, and newspaper articles on the centennial history of the church. One volume contains session meeting minutes for 1854-1917.
